article_title: Mom Allegedly Forces 'Unnecessary And Potentially Harmful' Surgeries On Daughter
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: next, level, child, abuse, mom, allegedly, forces, unnecessary, and, potentially, harmful

og.description: A mother faces prison time for her parenting choices.
og.title: Mom Accused Of Forcing Unnecessary Surgeries On Her Kid For Years
